911: Here is a story recorded in the dust laden ancient books.

これは、埃の積もった古書に記されていた物語。
이것은 먼지 쌓인 고서에 기록된 이야기.
This is a story recorded in a dusty ancient book.
This is a story that was recorded in a dusty old book.
The immortal being from the sacred land, coming across the chaos, witnessing the fickleness of the mudane world, lamenting over the transience of mortal life.
自神州而来的仙人，跨越混沌乱世，看尽炎凉，悲叹沧桑之间逝者如尘。
神州から来た仙人は、混沌乱世を乗り越え、時代の盛衰を見尽くした。儚き世で塵芥のように去りゆく者を嘆いた。
신주에서 온 선인은 혼돈의 난세를 넘어, 시대의 흥망성쇠를 다 보았다. 덧없는 세상에서 먼지처럼 사라져가는 이를 한탄했다.
Immortals who came from the divine state, crossed the chaotic and chaotic world, saw all the inflammation, and lamented that those who passed away between the vicissitudes of life were like dust.
The hermit from Shenzhou overcame the chaotic and turbulent world and saw the rise and fall of the ages. He lamented for those who pass away like dust in the ephemeral world.
The warrior from the far east wandering over wars and corpses, cutting off all the links in the world, laughing at treachery of human beings.
于极东漂泊的武士，踏过遍地尸骸，斩尽烟火，笑侃天地之内仁义似土。
極東をさすらう武士は、無数の屍を踏み越え、戦場で敵を斬り尽くした。天地の間に塵芥の如く消える仁義を笑った。
극동을 떠도는 무사는 무수한 시체를 밟고 넘어, 전장에서 적을 베어 넘겼다. 천지간에 먼지처럼 사라지는 인의를 비웃었다.
The samurai who drifted in the Far East, stepped over the corpses, cut through the fireworks, and laughed at the benevolence and righteousness of the earth and sky.

The warriors who wandered the Far East stepped over countless corpses and cut down their enemies on the battlefield. They laughed at the benevolence that vanished like a speck of dust between heaven and earth.
The two have met and befriended with each through fight, chasing after the malice spreading across the world.
相遇的二人，以武相交，结伴追寻蔓延于世间的恶意。
二人は戦いを通じて出会い、ともに世に蔓延する悪意の痕跡を追った。
두 사람은 싸움을 통해 만나, 함께 세상에 만연한 악의 흔적을 쫓았다.
The two who met, befriended each other with martial arts and partnered to pursue the malice that spreads in the world.
The two met through battle, and together they followed the trail of malice spreading in the world.
And now, they are crossing the ocean to Europe…
而此刻，二人漂洋过海，直至大洋彼岸的欧洲……
そして今、はるばる大海原を渡り、はるか遠い欧州へ辿りついた——
그리고 지금, 먼 바다를 건너, 아득히 먼 유럽에 도착한 ——
And at the moment, the two of them sailed across the ocean until they reached Europe on the other side of the ocean ......
